properties.displayName: API App should only be accessible over HTTPS
properties.description: Use of HTTPS ensures server/service authentication and protects data in transit from network layer eavesdropping attacks.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy

properties.displayName: Deploy Diagnostic Settings for Azure Function App to Log Analytics workspace
properties.description: Deploys the diagnostic settings for Azure Function App to stream to a Log Analytics workspace when any function app which is missing this diagnostic settings is created or updated. The Policy will set the diagnostic with all metrics and category enabled

metadata.description: Select Log Analytics workspace from dropdown list. If this workspace is outside of the scope of the assignment you must manually grant 'Log Analytics Contributor' permissions (or similar) to the policy assignment's principal ID.
Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Whether to enable metrics stream to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to enable logs stream to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False

properties.displayName: Deploy Diagnostic Settings for App Service Web App to Log Analytics workspace
properties.description: Deploys the diagnostic settings for Web App to stream to a Log Analytics workspace when any Web App which is missing this diagnostic settings is created or updated. The Policy will set the diagnostic with all metrics and category enabled

metadata.description: Select Log Analytics workspace from dropdown list. If this workspace is outside of the scope of the assignment you must manually grant 'Log Analytics Contributor' permissions (or similar) to the policy assignment's principal ID.
Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Whether to enable metrics stream to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to enable logs stream to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False

properties.displayName: Enforce secure-by-default App Service for Financial Services Industry
properties.description: This policy initiative is a group of policies that ensures App Service is compliant per FSI Landing Zones

policyDefinitionGroups.name: Encryption
policyDefinitionGroups.displayName: Ensure App Service is using secure encryption
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Policy to ensure App Service is using secure encryption

policyDefinitionGroups.name: Network
policyDefinitionGroups.displayName: Ensure App Service is not accessible over the public internet
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Policy to ensure App Service is not accessible over the public internet

policyDefinitionGroups.name: Identity
policyDefinitionGroups.displayName: Ensure usage of centralized identity and auhtorization system for App Service
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Policy to ensure App Service is not using local authorization

policyDefinitionGroups.name: Logging
policyDefinitionGroups.displayName: Ensure App Service is logging all events to Log Analytics
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Policy to ensure App Service is logging all events to Log Analytics workspace
